Original: 是個很舒服喝酒的地方
EN: It's a very comfortable place to drink

Original: 老闆人很親切，紅酒好喝，氣氛悠閒，支持一下！
EN: The boss is very kind, red wine is delicious, and the atmosphere is leisurely.

Original: 小姐人好介紹足，好喝氣氛佳
EN: Miss people are good to introduce enough, delicious atmosphere is good

Wine

EN: Love love 💚🍷 ...

Original: 輕鬆 微醺的好地方
EN: Easy to be a good place

Original: 如果您正在台北尋找一個舒適的角落，享用美味的天然葡萄酒和美食（當然還有友好熱情的主人），那麼這裡就是您的最佳選擇！如果你幸運的話，可能會嘗試一些在其他地方找不到的限量版:)
EN: If you are looking for a comfortable corner in Taipei and enjoying delicious natural wines and food (of course, there are friendly and enthusiastic owners), then this is your best choice!If you are lucky, you may try some limited editions that cannot be found elsewhere :)

Original:
完美的地方！很棒的氛圍！
可以自備食物搭配特級天然酒！
EN:
Perfect place!A great atmosphere!
You can bring your own food with special natural wine!

Original:
老太太人很好，很善良🧡有很多天然酒，這是我第一次喝橘子酒🥰
我家附近也想要一家這樣的店💕 …
EN:
The old lady is very good, very kind 🧡 has a lot of natural wine, this is the first time I drink orange wine 🥰
I also want such a shop near my family ...

Original: 放鬆一下，美酒，美味的食物！嘗試了一種有趣的紅葡萄酒和白葡萄酒混合的葡萄酒！很有趣。
EN: Relax, wine, delicious food!Try a mixed wine with interesting red wine and white wine!Very interesting.
